mapper.insert: insert into board (boardId, boardTitle, boardAuthorId, boardContent, boardCreateDate, boardUpdateDate, boardLikeCount, boardDel, boardView) values (#{boardId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardAuthorId}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCreateDate}, #{boardUpdateDate}, #{boardLikeCount}, #{boardDel}, #{boardView})
mapper.select: select * from board order by boardCreateDate desc limit 10 offset #{offset};
